tweet_text: @stars_silva Is she putting all this stuff on his social media I wonder?  She certainly gets more views when there's drama.  How are you feeling Silva?  Hope you are on the mend! ❤️

tweet_text:
@JKSteinberger The biggest takeaway was that organisations that are actually doing well are far more likely to have some sort of "climate board" that the board is *actually* accountable to. 

Without that, everything is basically irrelevant.
